definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Our Stone Age ancestors certainly did not live in a feedlot.
sentences.chinese: 我們石器時代的祖先當然沒有生活在飼養場。

sentences.english: They breed longhorns on the ranch.
sentences.chinese: 他們在飼養場飼養長角牛。

sentences.english: The stock farm was circled with a fence.
Knut died in his enclosure at the Berlin Zoo Saturday morning.
sentences.chinese: 克努特週六上午死在柏林動物園他的飼養場裏。
邦斯是鴨鵝飼養場的場主。
